name: 0-to-X
overview:
Based on a hit internet phenomenon, 0-to-X is an addictive puzzler developed by nemesys. In addition to tile mashing fun, the game features an amazing soundtrack by Memblers. Some of it is almost twenty years old too, finally seeing the light of day with this release. Flash saves will store your high scores for years to come, thanks to the capabilities of Memblers’ GTROM boards.

There are 3 versions of the game - Regular Version, Numbered Version, and the Limited Version. The Numbered Version was sold on NintendoAge and is individually numbered on the title screen.
